solution_line_template: The cost of one card from each box in total is {cost_card_box1}+{cost_card_box2}=<<{cost_card_box1}+{cost_card_box2}={cost_one_card_from_each_box}>>{cost_one_card_from_each_box} dollars.
The total cost of cards the boy bought is {cost_one_card_from_each_box}*{num_cards_per_box}=<<{cost_one_card_from_each_box}*{num_cards_per_box}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} dollars.
